overview.en: Verasity (VRA) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Verasity has a current supply of 10,356,466,694 with 3,880,888,659.0929976 in circulation. The last known price of Verasity is 0.01624431 USD and is down -10.20 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 21 active market(s) with $13,271,197.13 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.verasity.io/.
